name: 💣 Carrier Pigeon 💣
description:
💣 Carrier Pigeon 💣

Playing as William of Orange, you are stuck behind enemy lines, with nothing but your trusty cannon. In an intense aerial standoff with the opposing front, the food becomes the predator when the worms strike back. William must use his newfound cargo to defeat the worm army.

A 3 Day self-imposed game jam among a group of friends.

*** You can Dive onto the Tents to bounce too!! ***

Team:
